author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

I think I made a little mistake in #26813, more precisely here: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26813/files#diff-7eb5532b1cb65bc84e460aeaebc307c1R170. Should be `auto const& blocks` to not copy them. Also, somewhere on the way I accidentally removed the destructor for the muon algo, therefore I wrap it into a std::unique_pointer now to fix a memory leak. Also, some other minor tweaks to make up for the mistakes:

* EDPutToken for pfCleanedCandidates
* Avoid temporary unique pointers to muon output collections 

I meant to amend this to #26813 but it was already signed off, so I didn't want to stop it.
That's my last PF PR now. @jpata, now it's all yours :)

#### PR validation:

Code compiles and matrix tests pass.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No backport intended.
title: Follow up on "Remove PFElectronAlgo and PFPhotonAlgo used back in Run 1"
